name: Block Crash In Car Simulator
description:
Block Crash In Car Simulator
Destroy blocks racing video game - a simulator of the destruction of the blocks and obstacles on the car!
Feel yourself in the race for survival!
Not everyone can get to the end, you need to learn how to drive!
But you will not only observe, but to shoot down the blocks and earn points!
The more accidents and damage the more points!
Only the most nimble and fast can break all the blocks!
Test your courage!
Unlock the entire fleet before your friends!
Beat friends record, get the highest score!
Defeat the sports car on the blocks!
Details realistically crumple and break!
Thank you for playing our games! Leave us ratings and reviews, and we will make our game more interesting!
